solution_line_template: Camilla needs {total_pizzas}/{pizzas_per_batch} = <<{total_pizzas}/{pizzas_per_batch}={batches_needed}>>{batches_needed} batches of pizza dough.
{batches_needed} batches of pizza would require {dough_time_per_batch} x {batches_needed} = <<{batches_needed}*{dough_time_per_batch}={total_dough_time}>>{total_dough_time} minutes
Camilla needs to bake the pizzas {total_pizzas}/{oven_capacity} = <<{total_pizzas}/{oven_capacity}={oven_rounds}>>{oven_rounds} times
{oven_rounds} times in the oven would take {oven_time_per_round} x {oven_rounds} =<<{oven_rounds}*{oven_time_per_round}={total_oven_time}>>{total_oven_time} minutes
Altogether, it would take {total_dough_time} + {total_oven_time} = <<{total_dough_time}+{total_oven_time}={total_minutes}>>{total_minutes} minutes to finish making {total_pizzas} pizzas
